response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and exceptional craftsmanship. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,200,000.

To make this offer more appealing, I propose to sell it to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this price aligns well with both our interests and sets the stage for a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
